## Summary
Management forecasts 2025 revenue of $36-37 billion with growth in Power and Electrification segments. Technology stocks like Nvidia and Broadcom drove market gains amid moderating inflation. Highlights investments in GE Vernova, Broadcom, and Eli Lilly aligned with long-term growth trends.
